result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on October 27, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

10:52 AM Defendant Marshall Wayne Allen in court.  Attorney Heidi E. Brewer in court for Marshall Wayne Allen.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls all cases.  22CF56 is set for an Initial Appearance.  Case to be taken first.  Heidi Brewer requests adjournment so she can be appointed.  10/10 at 9:00 a.m. to be scheduled.  STC of cases discussed.  Per Atty Brewer, working on cases.  10/27 at 1:15 for PTC.  Parties to contact immediately after PTC to schedule.  Bond continues.  Adj.  10:55 a.m.  klr
Status conference on October 3, 2022 at 10:50 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 8, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:44 a.m.  Court calls case.  Atty Heidi Brewer appears in person.  Def appears via Zoom.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Atty Brewer indicates defense wants cases to be separated out.  Has spoken with DA.  22CF8, 21CM38, 22CF13 (others ready for plea).  PTC to be set on 8/8 at 1:00 and if TRs not resolved, to be set for trial.  Adj.  10:52 a.m.
Status conference on July 25, 2022 at 10:40 am.

11:04 a.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Brewer appears in person for def, who appears via Zoom.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Atty Brewer requests STC in 30 days.  Court allows.  Per DA, written offer has been made.  STC to be scheduled for 7/25 at 10:40 a.m.  Adj.  11:06 a.m.  klr
Status conference on June 29, 2022 at 11:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on June 16, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Pre-trial conference on May 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

09:19 AM Defendant Marshall Wayne Allen in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video means for Defendant Marshall Wayne Allen. BOR in 22CF8, 22CT4, 22CF13.  Court calls cases, cites appearances.  Atty Brewer has gone through complaints.  Def waives reading.  ATty reserves all jurisd. challenges.  In Misd charges, mute, in felony charges, def waive time limits only for prelim.  22CF8, def preserves PL but waives TL.  PTC to be set for May 19th at 1:30 p.m.  22CT4, mids. charges, def stands mute.  Court to enter NG.  PTC on May 19th at 1:30 p.m.  22CF13, def preserves right to PL but waives TL.  PTC on May 19 at 1:30 p.m.  Adj.  9:23 p.m.  klr

09:04 AM Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video means for Defendant Marshall Wayne Allen. Prosecuting Atty Matthew J Tingstad appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Def FTA.  Atty indicates has spoken to def and expected him to be here.  22CT02 also referenced and 21CM08.  JA advises that were rescheduled.  Atty Brewer asks for cases to be adjourned to end of docket.  Court gives until 11:00.  If def not present by then, body only warrant authorized.  Adj. 9:07 a.m.  klr
Adjourned initial appearance on April 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
BACK ON RECORD AT 10:10 AM Defendant Marshall Wayne Allen in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Court notes that PD has notified court that he is eligible but have not appointed anyone yet.  Court continues IAs and STCs to allow atty time to go over with client.  On 22CT4, Court addressing bond today.  $400 was posted to be released from SD.  DA is satisfied with signature bond of $1,000.  Bond refunded to poster.  Conditions are:  Def not drive while revoked.  Explained to def.  No questions.  4/11 at 9:00 for all cases.  Adj.  10:15 a.m.  klr

10:04 a.m.  Court refers to all cases.  DA indicates not contact made by def.  DA requests warrant with condition that def can be released upon posting $1,000 cash and to appear the following Monday.  Court grants warrant but to avoid confusion, is only authorizing in 22CF8.  Adj.  10:05 a.m.  klr

3/7/22 Bond hearing minutes:  1:18 p.m.  Court calls case.  Marshall Allen appears, in custody of ICJ.  Def acks rct of PC statement.  Right to atty explained by Court.  Officer Kyle Mabie sworn in, direct by DA.  Identifies def.  Court questions def.  Def has received PC statement.  Previous bond indicates no alcohol.  Def had PBT of .09.  Court finds PC for felony bail jumping.  Inidial Appearance date to be set.  DA requests same conditions as previosu bonds.  No alcohol, no controlled substances.  Def indicates no objection to conditions.  Court refers to other bonds.  Def understands the no alcohol provision.  Court sets $1,000 cash bond with same conditions.  No alcohol or CT possession or consumption.  No contact with vic with initials of S.V.  Initial app to be set for 3/14 at 10:00 a.m.  Adj.  1:25 p.m.  klr

ALLEN, MARSHALL:  3/7/22 Bond hearing minutes:  1:18 p.m.  Court calls case.  Marshall Allen appears, in custody of ICJ.  Def acks rct of PC statement.  Right to atty explained by Court.  Officer Kyle Mabie sworn in, direct by DA.  Identifies def.  Court questions def.  Def has received PC statement.  Previous bond indicates no alcohol.  Def had PBT of .09.  Court finds PC for felony bail jumping.  Inidial Appearance date to be set.  DA requests same conditions as previosu bonds.  No alcohol, no controlled substances.  Def indicates no objection to conditions.  Court refers to other bonds.  Def understands the no alcohol provision.  Court sets $1,000 cash bond with same conditions.  No alcohol or CT possession or consumption.  No contact with vic with initials of S.V.  Initial app to be set for 3/14 at 10:00 a.m.  Adj.  1:25 p.m.  klr

03/07/22 $1,000 Cash bond signed bond document.

03/08/22 $1,000 cash bond posted 

03/07/22 PCS/JD
